𓇐 𓇏 𓆷 ≠ 𓃃 𓃄 𓃅 ≠ 𓋣 ≠ 𓏅 ⋍ 𓏃 ⇔ 𐝔 𐁗

𒌑 ≈ 𒋰𒐈𒋰 prado "pasture"

𒌑 úᵈ weeds Weiden βοτάνη "pastures"

𓊪 ≈ ⰱ պ in hieratic ⇔ 𓆷 bog ?

bu.ša паша paša (𓇐⋍ш) 𓋴𓇐𓏮𓆰 pastures, plants, herbage, vegetables, herb

bu.ša vs 𓋴 𓐟 𓄿 𓎛 𓃃 𓄹 𓏤 | toe | špička

𒀀𒃼 A.GAR3 agar Acker: field, meadow 𓎛 𓄿 𓏏 𓈅 𓏥 ; Alternative form: 𒅊 A Gar > gal 𒃲
𒀀𒊮 a-šà Acker 𒀀𒊮 eqlu 𒌑𒂵𒊒 ugāru 𓇏 𒃷 aša a swamp 𓇐 𓆷 𒀀𒊮 a-šag™ 𓋴 𓐍 𓏏 𓇏 𓈅

𒀀𒃸 A.KAR acre

𓇐 𓇏 ≈ 𒃷 ašag sadg 𒆳 šadû سَطْح saṭḥ səth ፂዖት ṣ́iʿot sḫt šꜣt site jꜣdt "field"
𒀀𒊮 a.šag mûšag₄ •masak መስክ mäsk

There seems to be some confusion between tree readings of 𓇐 𓇏 𓆷 Acker, base/field, swamp

The 'p'/base/field variant is supported by the hieratic version of 𓊪 which looks like 𓇐 ⋍ ш ! :

𓆤𓏏 Botten buttom bassa base 𓊪 pond,low land 𓇐𓆷

M21 𓇐⋍𓆷 #sAH s'event 𓇐𓅓𓆰Samen/Gemüse “Sahure”='near Re'

ჭაობი t͡ʃˀɑɔbi tswampi ⇔ chad

𓋴 𓅓 𓅱 𓆰 𓏥 | pastures, plants, herbage, vegetables, herbs | 𐍃𐌼𐌰𐌺𐌺𐌰 смокꙑ smoky, “fig” < 𐍃𐌼𐌰𐌺𐌺𐌰𐌱𐌰𐌲𐌼𐍃 (smakkabagms, “fig tree, sycomore”

𓋴 𓇐 𓐝 𓆰 | pastures |
𓌳 𓄿 𓎛 𓈇 𓏤 | pasture |
